entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
